   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to QMETTS's documentation!
==================================

**QMETTS** is the quantum analog of the minimally entangled typical thermal states and It can be used to determine thermal states on a quantum computer.
Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including :ref:`install <installation>` the project or :ref:`technicalities <Algorithm>`.  
If you want to know in detail each line of the code, go to :doc:`api`.



Contents
--------

.. toctree::
    usage
    api


.. note::

    This project is under active development
